title: MoHS - pull
description: Audio guide at the Museum of History of Science. Guide items are triggered by entering a numerical code into the app.

title: MoHS - push
description: Audio guide at the Museum of History of Science. Guide items are triggered by iBeacons.

title: NaturalHistory - pick
description: Sensing Evolution trail at Museum of Natural History. Items are chosen by users.

title: NaturalHistory - trail
description: Sensing Evolution trail at Museum of Natural History. Users are directed to items on a trail
